name: Leif's Adventure: Netherworld Hero
description:
Play Leif's Adventure, a story-driven cooperative 2d action-adventure about friendship and teamwork. A boy never meant to be a hero, learns that pure strength is not always the answer! Guide two completely different characters through the adventure of their lifetime and witness how bonding is a powerful source to overcome any obstacle!



The game's story mode can be played in either solo or coop mode.



- asymmetrical two-character gameplay
- 6 expanding worlds
- over 50 different weapons
- upgrade the skills of your characters
- screen-filling boss encounters
- secret mid-level-bosses
- exchangeable armor
